overview:
Michelle Pate received her Associates in Arts from International Fine Arts College in 1995. She has over fifteen years of experience as a creative professional, with a career that has allowed her the opportunity to work for most respected advertising agencies and direct mail companies. Her experience ranges from graphic designer, art director to production manager.

Her career has covered a complimentary range of jobs and skills that gives her a unique understanding of the creative world. She creates materials that attract the attention of her clientâ€™s target market while visually conveying their companyâ€™s image that get turned into eye-catching results-driven designs.

Mrs. Pateâ€™s continues to educate herself by attending graphic design, business and marketing seminars to give her a unique creative business prospective. She also attends local networking events to meet new prospective clients.
